meanings.definition: The act of incorrectly programming a computer or device.
meanings.sent1: The misprograming of the robot caused it to move in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent2: I fixed the misprograming in the software to prevent any errors.
meanings.sent3: The misprograming of the coffee machine made it dispense salt instead of sugar!
meanings.sent4: Her misprograming of the alarm clock turned it into a music player instead.
meanings.sent5: The misprograming of the GPS led us to a deserted road in the middle of nowhere.

meanings.definition: The state of being programmed incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: After the misprograming, the computer kept crashing.
meanings.sent2: The misprograming of the thermostat caused the room to be too cold.
meanings.sent3: The misprograming of the TV remote made it control the lights instead.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt like a misprograming computer, unable to process the information correctly.
meanings.sent5: The misprograming of the vending machine resulted in giving out free snacks to everyone.
